CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Alaistila' ealayha qabl 'an Yadhhab

 

Alsalam Alikum Hagop,

 

We know the challenges you face in last-mile delivery—it can be a real headache!

 

That’s why we’re excited to invite you to Seamless Saudi Arabia 2024 at Booth AD54-H4 from October 22-24.


 

Join brands like Nahdi, Oman Post, Danube Home, Sharaf DG, Pepkor Lifestyle & Hilti who’ve transformed their logistics with FarEye.

 

Our Dynamic Delivery Slot Booking and ETA Visibility are designed to ease your worries and boost customer satisfaction.

Join brands like Nahdi, Oman Post, Danube Home, Sharaf DG, Pepkor Lifestyle & Hilti who’ve transformed their logistics with FarEye.

 

Our Dynamic Delivery Slot Booking and ETA Visibility are designed to ease your worries and boost customer satisfaction.
